revisionDesc.change: Finalized - This is good to go.

Vote - Accept-Straight-to-Finalization - Middots should be high-punctus as per ed. pr; remove extra spaces in 1.2, 1.4, 1.7, 1.8, 1.12, 1.13, 1.14, 2.11, 2.12, 3.i.1, 3.i.4, 3.ii.1, 3.ii.2, 3.ii.3, 3.ii.10, 3.ii.12, 4.ii.1, 4.ii.2, 4.ii.9, 4.ii.13, 5.1, 5.9, 6.1, 6.6, 7.1, 7.5, 7.7, 7.8, 8.9, 8.12, 8.13, 8.15, 9.1, 9.2, 10.6, 11.2, 14.3, 14.6, 14.7, 15.2, 15.5, 15.8, 16.2, 16.5, 18.4, 18.9, 19.5, 20.1, 20.3, 25.3, 28.3, and 46.2; add diaireseis in 1.16, 12.2, 14.6, 15.4, 21.3, 25.1, 33.3, 48.2; add space to beginning of 1.17, 2.8, ; use lost.lin in fr. 3 col. i and fr. 4 col. i; dot epsilon in 3.ii.8; place antisigma in left margin at 4.ii.8; place iota in fr. 4.ii.12 as above the line; add space to end of 5.7; check coding of 5.12; add spaces to beginning and end of 6.5; add space to beginning of 7.3; the dipuncts of fr. 8 and fr. 10 are high-puncti; add space to end of 9.4; add subst tags to 9.6; add space to beginning of 10.2 and 10.5; add space to beginning of 11.1; add space to end of 13.2; add space to beginning of 15.7; remove period in 17.1; add space to beginning of 18.3; add space to beginning of 19.3 and 19.4 (and fix question mark by using |alt| tags); add space to beginning of 21.3; delete hyphen in 21.4; add space to beginning of 22.3 and 22.4; use |alt| tags for 24.3; dot alpha in 26.5; use lost.lin in 33.5-6 and 34, and 42.3; remove dot from end of 35.2; accent is scribal in 52.2; encode [.?] in 58.1. Review meta before finalization.
